references.paper_title: Efficient-VQGAN: Towards High-Resolution Image Generation with Efficient Vision Transformers
references.reason: This paper is referenced as being a contemporary visual generation framework which the paper seeks to improve upon through it's set-based tokenization.
This paper is an important reference because the DETR approach uses Hungarian matching which is a technique related to set supervision this paper seeks to improve on.
This paper utilizes MaskGIT's proxy code, suggesting its influence on the implementation or training strategy of the proposed model.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Models Beat GANs on Image Synthesis
references.reason: This paper is an important benchmark in image synthesis, indicating the standard by which image generation methods are compared which the set tokenization seeks to improve on.

references.paper_title: Taming Transformers for High-Resolution Image Synthesis
references.reason: This paper is an important baseline visual generation framework using transformers, serving as a fundamental approach for the set-based tokenization method.
